entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Îles-de-la-Madeleine
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:54 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Îles de la Madeleine Airport 04:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: -1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: WNW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this afternoon. Amount 10 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 this morning then northeast 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
